warranty: Description chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Description Dominate the field with the Rawlings Storm -13 Fastpitch Bat, built for young players developing their skills. Its one-piece, all-alloy construction provides durability while keeping the bat lightweight and easy to swing. Featuring an X-Tended Sweetspot, the extended barrel maximizes surface area for better contact. With a drop 13 length-to-weight ratio, this ultra-light bat helps players generate faster swing speeds. Approved for multiple leagues, this bat is perfect for beginners looking for performance at an affordable price.
